trans-unit.source: Provides a means for creating a software component that can serialize any part of a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application's content to a manufacturer's proprietary format.

<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializerFactory> in the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization> namespace is Microsoft's implementation of this interface for serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializerFactory> dans le <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization> espace de noms est l’implémentation Microsoft de cette interface pour sérialisé [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] contenu.

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you implement this interface only with a document format serializer that you wish to register using the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.RegisterSerializer(System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Nous vous recommandons d’implémenter cette interface uniquement avec un sérialiseur de format de document que vous souhaitez enregistrer à l’aide de la <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.RegisterSerializer(System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor,System.Boolean)" /> (méthode).

trans-unit.source: Accordingly, we recommend that you not call your implementations of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory" /> methods directly.
trans-unit.target: En conséquence, nous vous recommandons de pas appeler vos implémentations de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory" /> direct de méthodes.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> to which the returned object writes.
Initializes an object derived from the abstract <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> class for the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
An object of a class derived from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" />.
We recommend that you not call your implementation of this method directly.
trans-unit.target: Nous vous recommandons pas appeler votre implémentation de cette méthode directement.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter(System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor,System.IO.Stream)" /> method of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Au lieu de cela, utilisez le <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter(System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor,System.IO.Stream)" /> méthode de la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider" /> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default extension for files of the manufacturer's proprietary format.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the proprietary format's default file extension.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> représentant l’extension de fichier par défaut du format propriétaire.

trans-unit.source: This method is most useful if the leading period is included, for example, ".zzz"
trans-unit.target: Cette méthode est particulièrement utile si le point de début est inclus, par exemple, « .zzz »

trans-unit.source: Gets the public name of the manufacturer's serializing component.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the public name of the serializing component.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> représentant le nom public du composant de sérialisation.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the serializing component's manufacturer.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the manufacturer's name.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> représentant le nom du fabricant.

trans-unit.source: Gets the web address of the serializing component's manufacturer.
A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> representing the manufacturer's website.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> représentant le site Web du fabricant.
